text: Alicia Alonso (born Alicia Ernestina de la Caridad Martínez Hoya; 21 December 1921 - 17 October 2019) was a Cuban ballerina and choreographer. She was known for her portrayals of Giselle and the ballet version of Carmen. Alonso died in Havana on 17 October 2019 at the age of 98.‘A genius of dance.’ Cuban ballet icon Alicia Alonso dies at age 98 ==References== ==Other websites== *Alicia Alonso profile, UNESCO.org; accessed 5 May 2014.
